mapper.sql: SELECT pmp.ID id, pmp.MID_PROD_NAME cosName, pmp.PROD_NO prodNo, psp.PROD_NAME prodName, pmp.MID_PROD_NO midProdNo, pmp.MID_PROD_NAME midProdName, pmp.PARENT_NO parentNo, pmp.NORMS norms, pmp.PARAM param, pmp.MODEL_DESC modelDesc, pmp.UNIT unit, pmp.AMOUNT amount, pmp.STORE_ID storeId, pmp.ROCK_POSITION rockPosition, pmp.FACTORY_ID factoryId, pmp.SOURCE source, pmp.REMARK remark, pmp.DELETED deleted, pmp.COMPANY_ID companyId, pmp.CREATE_TIME createTime, pmp.CREATE_BY createBy, pmp.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, pmp.MODIFY_BY modifyBy, concat_ws("/", pmp.PROD_NO, psp.PROD_NAME) prodMsg, concat_ws("/", pmp.MID_PROD_NO, pmp.MID_PROD_NAME) midMsg, concat_ws("/", pmp.param, pmp.norms, pmp.MODEL_DESC) SyntheticField

where.if: AND ( pmp.PROD_NO like concat('%',#{entity.prodMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or pmp.PROD_NAME like concat('%',#{entity.prodMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
AND ( pmp.MID_PROD_NO like concat('%',#{entity.midMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or pmp.MID_PROD_NAME like concat('%',#{entity.midMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM PRODUCT_MID_PLM pmp left join aps.factory_set_mes fsm on pmp.factory_id = fsm.factory_id and fsm.deleted = 'F' left join product_store_plm psp on psp.prod_no = pmp.PROD_NO and psp.deleted = 'F'

SELECT pmp.ID id, pmp.MID_PROD_NAME cosName, pmp.PROD_NO prodNo, psp.PROD_NAME prodName, pmp.MID_PROD_NO midProdNo, pmp.MID_PROD_NAME midProdName, pmp.PARENT_NO parentNo, pmp.NORMS norms, pmp.PARAM param, pmp.MODEL_DESC modelDesc, pmp.UNIT unit, pmp.AMOUNT amount, pmp.STORE_ID storeId, pmp.ROCK_POSITION rockPosition, pmp.FACTORY_ID factoryId, pmp.SOURCE source, pmp.REMARK remark, pmp.DELETED deleted, pmp.COMPANY_ID companyId, pmp.CREATE_TIME createTime, pmp.CREATE_BY createBy, pmp.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, pmp.MODIFY_BY modifyBy, concat_ws("|", pmp.PROD_NO, psp.PROD_NAME) prodMsg, concat_ws("|", pmp.MID_PROD_NO, pmp.MID_PROD_NAME) midMsg, concat_ws("|", pmp.param, pmp.norms, pmp.MODEL_DESC) SyntheticField, fsm.FACTORY_NAME factoryName FROM PRODUCT_MID_PLM pmp left join aps.factory_set_mes fsm on pmp.factory_id = fsm.id and fsm.deleted = 'F' left join product_store_plm psp on psp.prod_no = pmp.PROD_NO and psp.deleted = 'F'
order by pmp.ID desc

SELECT id id, MID_PROD_NO midProdNo, MID_PROD_NAME midProdName FROM PRODUCT_MID_PLM WHERE PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DELETED = 'F' AND COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND MID_PROD_NO like concat ('%', #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
